name: Weapon Control System Failure
description:
Aliens invaded the Doom Laser Orbital Cannon Space Station! The cannon's safety systems are now unresponsive so you have to disable it's targeting mainframe in the middle of  this chaos.

Luckly for you, you have a very advanced prototype Combat Mech to fight your way in... Except that the untested weapon control systems are acting a bit wonky today...

Controls:

"W A S D" to move;

"E" to pickup health & ammo boxes;

Left and Right mouse buttons to pull the trigger and maybe persuade your weapons that this is the right time to fire;

Audio assets provided by freesound.org .
